mapper.select: SELECT pfm_idx as pfmIdx , banner_img_ori as bannerImgOri , banner_img_str as bannerImgStr , thumb_img_ori as thumbImgOri , thumb_img_str as thumbImgStr FROM main_banner

SELECT * FROM( SELECT p.* , pi.stored_name storedName fROM performance p JOIN tab_banner t ON p.pfm_idx = t.pfm_idx JOIN poster_info pi ON p.pfm_idx = pi.pfm_idx WHERE tab_genre = 3 ORDER BY p.create_date DESC )

SELECT * FROM( SELECT p.* , pi.stored_name storedName fROM performance p JOIN tab_banner t ON p.pfm_idx = t.pfm_idx JOIN poster_info pi ON p.pfm_idx = pi.pfm_idx WHERE tab_genre = 1 ORDER BY p.create_date DESC )

SELECT * FROM( SELECT p.* , pi.stored_name storedName fROM performance p JOIN tab_banner t ON p.pfm_idx = t.pfm_idx JOIN poster_info pi ON p.pfm_idx = pi.pfm_idx WHERE tab_genre = 2 ORDER BY p.create_date DESC )

select po.origin_name originName ,po.pfm_idx pfmIdx ,po.stored_name poster_name ,pp.* from ( select * from ( select ROWNUM as rnum, p.* from( select * from performance where genre_idx=1 order by pfm_idx )p ) where rnum between 1 and 5 order by rnum ) pp LEFT JOIN poster_info po ON pp.pfm_idx = po.pfm_idx
SELECT po.stored_name storedName , p.pfm_idx , p.name FROM performance p JOIN poster_info po ON po.pfm_idx = p.pfm_idx JOIN category_con cc ON cc.pfm_idx = p.pfm_idx
SELECT po.stored_name storedName , p.pfm_idx , p.name FROM performance p JOIN poster_info po ON po.pfm_idx = p.pfm_idx JOIN category_mu cm ON cm.pfm_idx = p.pfm_idx
SELECT po.stored_name storedName , p.pfm_idx , p.name FROM performance p JOIN poster_info po ON po.pfm_idx = p.pfm_idx JOIN category_fam cf ON cf.pfm_idx = p.pfm_idx

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM no , PP.* FROM ( SELECT p.* , h.hall_name , pi.stored_name poster_name FROM performance p JOIN poster_info pi ON p.pfm_idx = pi.pfm_idx JOIN hall h ON p.hall_idx = h.hall_idx WHERE p.genre_idx = 1 ORDER BY p.create_date ) PP )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM no , PP.* FROM ( SELECT p.* , h.hall_name , pi.stored_name poster_name FROM performance p JOIN poster_info pi ON p.pfm_idx = pi.pfm_idx JOIN hall h ON p.hall_idx = h.hall_idx WHERE p.genre_idx = 2 ORDER BY p.create_date ) PP )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM no , PP.* FROM ( SELECT p.* , h.hall_name , pi.stored_name poster_name FROM performance p JOIN poster_info pi ON p.pfm_idx = pi.pfm_idx JOIN hall h ON p.hall_idx = h.hall_idx WHERE p.genre_idx = 3 ORDER BY p.create_date ) PP )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM no , PP.* FROM ( SELECT p.* , h.hall_name , pi.stored_name poster_name FROM performance p JOIN poster_info pi ON p.pfm_idx = pi.pfm_idx JOIN hall h ON p.hall_idx = h.hall_idx WHERE p.pfm_idx IN ( SELECT pfm_idx FROM pfm_theme WHERE theme_idx = #{themeIdx} ) ) PP )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM no , PP.* FROM ( SELECT p.* , h.hall_name , pi.stored_name poster_name FROM performance p JOIN poster_info pi ON p.pfm_idx = pi.pfm_idx JOIN hall h ON p.hall_idx = h.hall_idx WHERE genre_idx=${genreIdx} ORDER BY ROUND(ABS(SYSDATE-ticket_end),0) ) PP )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM no , PP.* FROM ( SELECT p.* , h.hall_name , pi.stored_name poster_name FROM performance p JOIN poster_info pi ON p.pfm_idx = pi.pfm_idx JOIN hall h ON p.hall_idx = h.hall_idx WHERE genre_idx=${genreIdx} ORDER BY ticket_start DESC ) PP )

SELECT po.origin_name originName , po.stored_name poster_name , pp.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM as rnum, p.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM performance order by create_date desc ) p )pp LEFT JOIN poster_info po ON pp.pfm_idx = po.pfm_idx WHERE rnum BETWEEN 1 AND 5 ORDER BY rnum

SELECT po.origin_name originName , po.stored_name poster_name , pp.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM as rnum, p.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM performance order by create_date desc ) p )pp LEFT JOIN poster_info po ON pp.pfm_idx = po.pfm_idx ORDER BY rnum

SELECT po.origin_name originName , po.stored_name poster_name , pp.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM as rnum, p.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM performance ORDER BY pfm_start desc ) p )pp LEFT JOIN poster_info po ON pp.pfm_idx = po.pfm_idx ORDER BY rnum

SELECT P.pfm_idx, P.NAME, genre_idx, pfm_start, pfm_end, ticket_start, ticket_end, P.hall_idx , age_grade_idx, running_time, P.create_date, Ps.stored_name poster_name, H.hall_name, COUNT(S.seat_idx) cnt FROM performance P LEFT JOIN seat S ON P.hall_idx = S.hall_idx LEFT JOIN hall H ON P.hall_idx = H.hall_idx LEFT JOIN poster_info Ps ON P.pfm_idx = Ps.pfm_idx WHERE #{value } between ticket_start and ticket_end GROUP BY P.pfm_idx, P.NAME, genre_idx, pfm_start, pfm_end, ticket_start, ticket_end, P.hall_idx , age_grade_idx, running_time, P.create_date, Ps.stored_name, H.hall_name ORDER BY cnt

SELECT P.pfm_idx, P.NAME, genre_idx, pfm_start, pfm_end, ticket_start, ticket_end, P.hall_idx , age_grade_idx, running_time, P.create_date, Ps.stored_name poster_name, H.hall_name, COUNT(S.seat_idx) cnt FROM performance P LEFT JOIN seat S ON P.hall_idx = S.hall_idx LEFT JOIN hall H ON P.hall_idx = H.hall_idx LEFT JOIN poster_info Ps ON P.pfm_idx = Ps.pfm_idx WHERE (ticket_start between #{start } and #{end }) OR (ticket_end between #{start } and #{end }) OR (#{start } between ticket_start and ticket_end) OR (#{end } between ticket_start and ticket_end) GROUP BY P.pfm_idx, P.NAME, genre_idx, pfm_start, pfm_end, ticket_start, ticket_end, P.hall_idx , age_grade_idx, running_time, P.create_date, Ps.stored_name, H.hall_name ORDER BY cnt
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM seat WHERE hall_idx = #{hallIdx }

SELECT po.origin_name originName , po.stored_name poster_name , pp.* FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM as rnum, p.* FROM ( SELECT * FROM performance
WHERE NAME LIKE '%${value }%'
ORDER BY pfm_start desc ) p )pp LEFT JOIN poster_info po ON pp.pfm_idx = po.pfm_idx ORDER BY rnum

SELECT po.origin_name originName , po.stored_name storedName , po.pfm_idx pfmIdx FROM( SELECT * FROM pfm_theme WHERE theme_idx IN ( SELECT pt.theme_idx FROM prefer_theme pt, prefer_artist pa WHERE pt.user_idx = pa.user_idx AND pt.user_idx=${value} ))th LEFT JOIN poster_info po ON th.pfm_idx = po.pfm_idx

SELECT po.pfm_idx pfmIdx , po.origin_name originName , po.stored_name storedName , p.name , p.pfm_start pfmStart , p.pfm_end pfmEnd FROM ( SELECT * FROM performance
WHERE name LIKE '%${value }%'
ORDER BY create_date DESC ) p LEFT JOIN poster_info po ON p.pfm_idx = po.pfm_idx

SELECT count(*) FROM ( SELECT * FROM performance
WHERE name LIKE '%${value }%'
ORDER BY create_date DESC )

SELECT artist_idx as artistIdx , theme_idx as themeIdx , name , img_uri as imgUri FROM artist
WHERE name LIKE '%${value }%'

SELECT P.pfm_idx, P.NAME, genre_idx, pfm_start, pfm_end, ticket_start, ticket_end, P.hall_idx , age_grade_idx, running_time, P.create_date, Ps.stored_name poster_name, H.hall_name, COUNT(S.seat_idx) cnt FROM performance P LEFT JOIN seat S ON P.hall_idx = S.hall_idx LEFT JOIN hall H ON P.hall_idx = H.hall_idx LEFT JOIN poster_info Ps ON P.pfm_idx = Ps.pfm_idx WHERE ( p.genre_idx = #{genreIdx } AND ( (ticket_start between #{start } and #{end }) OR (ticket_end between #{start } and #{end }) OR (#{start } between ticket_start and ticket_end) OR (#{end } between ticket_start and ticket_end) ) ) GROUP BY P.pfm_idx, P.NAME, genre_idx, pfm_start, pfm_end, ticket_start, ticket_end, P.hall_idx , age_grade_idx, running_time, P.create_date, Ps.stored_name, H.hall_name ORDER BY cnt
